statements: UPDATE employee_work_schedule SET availability = '{"Monday": true, "Tuesday": false, "Wednesday": true}' WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE employee_work_schedule SET remote_meetings = true WHERE employee_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE employee_work_schedule SET work_schedule = '{"Monday": "8am-5pm", "Tuesday": "8am-5pm", "Wednesday": "8am-5pm", "Thursday": "8am-5pm", "Friday": "8am-5pm"}', availability = '{"Monday": true, "Tuesday": true, "Wednesday": false, "Thursday": true, "Friday": false}', remote_meetings = true WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE employee_work_schedule SET remote_meetings = false, work_schedule = '{"Monday": "9am-6pm", "Tuesday": "9am-6pm", "Wednesday": "9am-6pm", "Thursday": "8am-5pm", "Friday": "8am-5pm"}', availability = '{"Monday": true, "Tuesday": true, "Wednesday": true, "Thursday": false, "Friday": true}' WHERE employee_id = '987e6543-21b8-d312-654a-765461418000';
UPDATE employee_work_schedules SET availability_for_meetings = TRUE WHERE employee_id = 123;
UPDATE remote_meeting_availability SET availability_status = FALSE, meeting_date = '2023-10-15' WHERE employee_id = 456;
UPDATE employee_work_schedules SET availability_for_meetings = true WHERE employee_id = 123;
UPDATE remote_meeting_availability SET availability_status = false, meeting_date = '2023-05-20' WHERE employee_id = 456;
UPDATE employee_schedule SET availability = TRUE WHERE employee_id = 1001
UPDATE meeting_schedule SET start_time = '09:00:00', end_time = '10:00:00' WHERE meeting_id = 2001
UPDATE employee_schedule SET availability = FALSE WHERE employee_id = 1234;
UPDATE meeting_schedule SET end_time = '14:00:00' WHERE meeting_id = 5678;
UPDATE employee SET availability = TRUE WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE schedule SET work_hours = 8 WHERE employee_id = 2 AND date = '2022-09-10';
UPDATE employee SET work_schedule = 'Monday, Wednesday, Friday' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE meeting_attendance SET is_attending = true WHERE meeting_id = 2 AND employee_id = 3;
UPDATE employee_schedule SET start_time = '09:00:00' WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE meeting_schedule SET remote_meeting = true, topic = 'Project Kickoff Meeting' WHERE meeting_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE employee_schedule SET availability = FALSE WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE meeting_schedule SET topic = 'Project Update' WHERE meeting_id = 'abcdefg-1234-5678-hijk-lmnopqrstuvwx';
